IMF Business Hours, Holidays, and Emergency Closures

Saturday, June 13, 2020, 6:17:27 PM EDT (this page refreshes every 30 seconds)

Emergency and Weather-related Information Alert Line

The IMF's Alert Line at + 1 (202) 623-9999 also relates emergency or weather-related decisions concerning the IMF's Washington Headquarters. Staff wishing to report an incident of staff misconduct should contact the IMF's Integrity Hotline.

Should an emergency affect IMF operations, situation updates will be posted below.

IMF Alert Line—For Emergency and weather-related information

Business Hours

The IMF's Washington Headquarters are normally open for business Monday through Friday from 8:30 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. (EDT). Headquarters are closed on Saturdays, Sundays and on the days indicated in the schedule below.

Holiday Schedule


2019
New Year's Day January 1
Birthday of Martin Luther King, Jr. January 21
Presidents' Day February 18
Memorial Day May 27
Independence Day July 4
Labor Day September 2
Columbus Day October 14
Thanksgiving Day November 28-29 (observed)
Christmas Day December 25

2020
New Year's Day January 1
Birthday of Martin Luther King, Jr. January 20
Presidents' Day February 17
Memorial Day May 25
Independence Day July 3 (observed)
Labor Day September 7
Columbus Day October 12
Thanksgiving Day November 26-27 (observed)
Christmas Day December 25
